sentences.english: When making self-introduction, how many minutes should it take?
sentences.chinese: 做自我介紹時，應站在靠哪邊的位置？

sentences.english: These were the women who had the best chance of receiving an introductory e-mail from a man.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的女人更可能收到男人的自我介紹郵件。

sentences.english: Polish your presentations and deliver them enthusiastically to the right market.
sentences.chinese: 做好你的自我介紹，並切要瞄準適當的市場。

sentences.english: Jerry wanted to introduce himself to Helen, but he didn't want to come on too strong.
sentences.chinese: 傑瑞想要向海倫自我介紹，但他不想表現得太猴急。

sentences.english: Please see the following personality self introduction.
sentences.chinese: 請看以下的個性自我介紹範文。

sentences.english: B: Yes, that's right. A: I'm just calling to introduce myself.
sentences.chinese: 我打電話是向您作自我介紹，我姓唐。

sentences.english: Let me introduce myself first. My name is Zhang Hua.
sentences.chinese: 我先自我介紹一下，我叫張華。

sentences.english: The floor seniors will introduce themselves later today and answer any questions you have.
sentences.chinese: 今天樓長要做自我介紹並回答你的任何問題。

sentences.english: Then each trembling newbie had to come up to the front and briefly introduce themselves.
sentences.chinese: 然後每個人都要顫巍巍的走到最前面去做自我介紹。

sentences.english: And you introduced yourself to him then.
sentences.chinese: 所以你向他做了自我介紹。

sentences.english: And you can do a brief introduction. -Sure.
sentences.chinese: 該你做下簡單的自我介紹了，好的。

sentences.english: So I now also is reluctant to part with self-introduction, not willing to abandon.
sentences.chinese: 所以我現在還對自我介紹戀戀不捨，不願拋棄。

sentences.english: Yeah. Why don't you stop there?
sentences.chinese: 好的，你的自我介紹先到這裏吧？

sentences.english: Could you introduce yourself in English?
He introduced himself to Comrade Wang, hoping to enter into conversation with him.
sentences.chinese: 他向王同志作了自我介紹，想同他攀談。

definition: to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
senior female fellow student or apprentice/daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher
to apply (for a job)/to reply to a job advertisement
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
